// Author: Mustafa ,Contest: ClashCredenz, Team name: javacpp
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
    int m,n,sum=0,i;
	bool flag=true;
	double temp;
	double a,l,neg;
	string s;
    cin>>n;
	cin>>s;
	cin>>a;
	cin>>l;
	neg=l*-1;
	temp=0.0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{ 
		if(s[i]=='L')temp-=a;
		else temp+=a;
		if(temp>=l || temp<=neg){flag=false;break;}
		}
		if(flag)printf("YES");
		else printf("NO");
    
return 0;
}
